clusters.name: Processing Error: Missing Item Metadata
clusters.description: I cannot fulfill your request to identify prerequisite chains, group items into thematic clusters, and propose an ordered learning sequence because the full metadata for the provided content items was not included. Only item IDs were supplied. To perform the task, I require fields such as 'type', 'title', 'tags', 'prerequisites', 'complexity', and 'learningPath' for each item.

items.reason: Missing full metadata to process this item effectively. Cannot determine its type, prerequisites, or complexity for clustering and ordering.
